# Introduction to var Function in R

The var function in R is used to calculate the variance of a given set of numbers stored in a vector or list. This can be used to obtain an overall measure of the dispersion of the data.

## What Package Contains the var Function

The var function is part of the base package in R, so it doesn't require any specialized packages to be loaded.
